title: (x) University of the Arts London logo - FS Lola {Akira}
content:
I really dislike this logo, as I prefer the old one But I need to reproduce  
it for a project.

Does anyone have any idea what the typeface is?

Many Thanks indeed!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110107091608im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ual_6445.jpg)
author: Ashleyco

comments.content: Reproducing logos yourself is probably not a good idea. Why don't you try and obtain a PDF/EPS?
Unless you wish to subvert it that is.
I have a CSM eps logo if you want? It's the same as above but has the additional college name and is the wrong colour.
Thanks (Akira1975) Hi (1985) thanks for the input. I just wanted to produce a high quality black and white version... Ive sorted it now. Cheers.
